alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 5:51AM AKST until February 17 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibilities reduced to one half mile. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst visibilities are mainly along the coast. The main front will push north of the area and steady snow will turn to snow showers, which should allow visibility to gradually improve further by this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
